m_szDocTitle: Ghosn Sees Bolt EV, Mercedes Fuel-Cell SUV, Hyperloop Test Track: Today's Car News

Close 2,275 views Jan 19, 2016 2016 Mercedes-Benz GLC-Class (Euro-spec) Today, see how Renault-Nissan CEO Carlos Ghosn reacted to the 2017 Chevrolet Bolt EV electric car, and read about a possible hydrogen fuel-cell version of the Mercedes-Benz GLC-Class crossover, as well as a test track for Elon Musk's "Hyperloop."
